TextLibrary.Text: Maybe they want us to think they've gone this way. Maybe it's a false trail.
Maybe they want us to think they've gone this way. Maybe it's a false trail.
Think for a minute. If your prime directive was to evolve, what would you need? Information. Where is the best source of information? The Luminary Archive.
Think for a minute. If your prime directive was to evolve, what would you need? Information. Where is the best source of information? The Luminary Archive.
The Luminary Archive? Nobody knows where that is.
The Luminary Archive? Nobody knows where that is.
I believe it lies out on the rim beyond Altair and Aquarius. Kirine is right.
I believe it lies out on the rim beyond Altair and Aquarius. Kirine is right.
Even so, isn't it hidden and well-protected?
Even so, isn't it hidden and well-protected?
Yes, but the Soulless, and Beta Prime if he leads them, have proved they are more than capable in battle. We should start our search on Aquarius IV.
Yes, but the Soulless, and Beta Prime if he leads them, have proved they are more than capable in battle. We should start our search on Aquarius IV.
